v8:item.v8:content: What type of company are you setting up?
What is the first month of your fiscal year?
Is the company product-based, service-based or both?
Let's get some basic information about your company.
Does the company have multiple locations?
Does the company manufacture or assemble products?
Do you need track lots and/or serial numbers?
Do you receive items that you have ordered?
Does your company price items using more than 2 decimals?
How many decimals (2, 3 or 4) would you like to use when pricing*?
*Please note that this number may not be decreased after increasing.
Does your company sell or buy items with fractional quantities?
How many decimals (1-4) would you like to use*?
*Please note that this number may not be decreased after increasing.
Now we'll set up your a chart of accounts based on the answers you have provided.
